import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../FormEstilos/addEspeciales.css"; import { agregarEspecialApi } from "../../../Api/especiales"; export default function AddEspeciales() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", ingrediente: "", precio: "", detalle: "", foto: "NA" }); const changeForm = e => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarEspecialApi(inputs); } return (
